Subject: EMGEPRON - Upgrade EPP from 5.6.0.0 to 5.9.3.0 without internet
Description:
Hello Team,

As the title says, we need the offline patchs to upgrade the server from 5.6.0.0 to 5.9.3.0 so we can apply the hotfix and keep the server healthy. The server is a marine airgapped machine so it cannot access internet by no means.

Best regards,
Solution_Comment__c:
Deployed: Hotfix adv-2024-002

We did the following:
- made a snapshot
- checked and there was space available - the reason they got that message with low disk space was because of a but in 5.8.1.0. We were on 5.9.0.0 so it was fixed
- upgraded the EPP server
- applied the offline server vulnerability patch
- applied the offline client vulnerability patch
